title: Echoes of a Lost Age
goal: Kaelen escapes the sanctuary and observes the drastically changed modern world, sensing a subtle decay.

beats.summary: Kaelen finds a hidden exit from the sanctuary, emerging into a world he does not recognize.
He observes the landscape, noticing both technological advancements and subtle signs of environmental decay or unnatural stillness.
A faint, unsettling whisper or chill follows him, a premonition of an ancient wrong.
